hotels.title: Contemporary Cool Miri Borneo Escape with Rooftop Pool & Three Restaurants and Bars
hotels.description: Set at the centre of coastal Miri City, this contemporary-cool escape pairs urban living with vivid colours and designs inspired by Borneo. The perfect home base for exploration, you're free to visit the untouched shores of Tusan Beach, shop 'til you drop at nearby shopping malls, marvel at temples like Tua Pek Kong or travel farther to Borneo's enchanting national parks. Back at the hotel, three restaurants and bars await - enjoy international favourites and Asian specialties at Belian, cool off with a gelato at Atoti and indulge in Latin American flavours and fresh cocktails at the cave-like Cavakita. Take a dip in the sparkling infinity-edge rooftop pool, and keep up with your routine at the fitness centre.
